death_place.zh-cn: 香港中环香港文华东方酒店
death_place.en: Mandarin Oriental, Hong Kong, Central, Hong Kong

description.zh-cn: 香港男歌手、演员、词曲作家，是粤语流行音乐高峰时期的代表人物之一，也是亚洲顶级巨星和华人流行文化的指标人物。他在音乐和电影领域均取得了辉煌成就。
description.en: A Hong Kong singer, actor, and songwriter, who was one of the representative figures during the golden age of Cantopop. He was a top Asian superstar and an icon of Chinese popular culture, achieving immense success in both music and film.

description.zh-cn: 张国荣的同性伴侣，两人自幼相识，展开了长达20年的感情。在张国荣去世后，以“未亡人”身份处理其后事。
description.en: Leslie Cheung's same-sex partner. They knew each other since childhood and had a relationship that lasted for 20 years. After Cheung's death, he handled the funeral arrangements as his surviving partner.

description.zh-cn: 一种精神障碍，张国荣于2002年患上内源性抑郁症，最终因此病自杀身亡。
description.en: A mental disorder. Leslie Cheung was diagnosed with endogenous depression in 2002, which ultimately led to his suicide.

description.zh-cn: 张国荣于2000至2001年举办的世界巡回演唱会，由他亲自担任艺术总监。其前卫的造型在当时受到香港媒体的普遍批评和嘲讽，据其经纪人陈淑芬称，这次打击是导致他患上抑郁症的最大原因。
description.en: A world concert tour held by Leslie Cheung from 2000 to 2001, for which he served as the artistic director. His avant-garde styling was widely criticized and ridiculed by the Hong Kong media at the time. According to his manager Florence Chan, this blow was the main reason for his depression.

description.zh-cn: 张国荣的经纪人，在他事业早期牵线其转投无线电视及华星唱片。张国荣在自杀前最后一刻联系的人也是她。
description.en: Leslie Cheung's manager, who helped him sign with TVB and Capital Artists early in his career. She was also the last person Cheung contacted before his suicide.

description.zh-cn: 张国荣的父亲，香港著名的洋服裁缝，曾为好莱坞明星马龙·白兰度等人缝制服装。
description.en: Leslie Cheung's father, a famous tailor in Hong Kong who made clothes for Hollywood stars like Marlon Brando.

description.zh-cn: 张国荣的母亲。
description.en: Leslie Cheung's mother.

description.zh-cn: 张国荣的大姐，香港知名社会菁英。
description.en: Leslie Cheung's eldest sister, a well-known social elite in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港女演员，曾与张国荣短暂交往。张国荣曾在22岁时向她求婚但被拒绝。
description.en: A Hong Kong actress who had a brief relationship with Leslie Cheung. Cheung proposed to her when he was 22, but she declined.

description.zh-cn: 张国荣于1984年发行的歌曲，此曲红透全香港，为香港乐坛注入了劲歌热舞的活力，奠定了他在香港乐坛的巨星地位。
description.en: A song released by Leslie Cheung in 1984. It became a massive hit throughout Hong Kong, injecting a new energy of upbeat dance music into the local music scene and solidifying his superstar status.

description.zh-cn: 1993年上映的电影，由张国荣主演。该片使张国荣扬名国际影坛，获得多项国际大奖及提名。
description.en: A 1993 film starring Leslie Cheung. The film brought him international fame and earned numerous international awards and nominations.

description.zh-cn: 1991年上映的电影，张国荣凭借此片获得第十届香港电影金像奖最佳男主角。
description.en: A 1991 film for which Leslie Cheung won the Best Actor award at the 10th Hong Kong Film Awards.

description.zh-cn: 香港女演员。据一种说法，张国荣“哥哥”的绰号起源于1987年拍摄《倩女幽魂》时，王祖贤在片场如此称呼他。
description.en: A Hong Kong actress. According to one account, Leslie Cheung's nickname 'Gor Gor' (哥哥, older brother) originated from her addressing him this way on the set of 'A Chinese Ghost Story' in 1987.

description.zh-cn: 台湾女演员。据一种说法，张国荣“哥哥”的绰号起源于与她合作《白发魔女传》时，两人互称“哥哥”和“姐姐”。
description.en: A Taiwanese actress. According to one account, Leslie Cheung's nickname 'Gor Gor' (哥哥, older brother) originated when they worked together on 'The Bride with White Hair', and they addressed each other as 'brother' and 'sister'.

description.zh-cn: 香港音乐人，张国荣的恩师。1982年，张国荣跟随他转投无线电视及华星唱片。
description.en: A Hong Kong musician and Leslie Cheung's mentor. In 1982, Cheung followed him to join TVB and Capital Artists.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国的大学，张国荣曾在此攻读纺织系，后因父亲中风而辍学。
description.en: A university in the UK where Leslie Cheung studied textile management before dropping out due to his father's stroke.

description.zh-cn: 香港唱片公司。1982年，张国荣转投该公司，并在此期间凭借《风继续吹》和《Monica》等歌曲成为巨星。
description.en: A Hong Kong record label. Leslie Cheung signed with the company in 1982 and became a superstar with hits like 'The Wind Blows On' and 'Monica' during this period.

description.zh-cn: 香港唱片公司，隶属于宝丽金唱片。张国荣于1987年转投该公司，进入其歌唱事业的巅峰时期。
description.en: A Hong Kong record label under PolyGram. Leslie Cheung signed with the company in 1987, entering the peak of his singing career.

description.zh-cn: 台湾唱片公司。张国荣于1995年复出乐坛后签约该公司，发行了《宠爱》等专辑。
description.en: A Taiwanese record label. After returning to the music scene in 1995, Leslie Cheung signed with this company and released albums such as 'Beloved'.

description.zh-cn: 国际唱片公司。张国荣于1999年签约该公司，直至去世。
description.en: An international record company. Leslie Cheung signed with this company in 1999 and remained with it until his death.

description.zh-cn: 香港歌手及演员，张国荣的圈中挚友之一。
description.en: A Hong Kong singer and actress, one of Leslie Cheung's closest friends in the entertainment industry.

description.zh-cn: 香港导演，曾执导张国荣主演的电影《英雄本色》。他曾表示在自己落魄时，张国荣总是伸出援手资助他。
description.en: A Hong Kong director who directed Leslie Cheung in the film 'A Better Tomorrow'. He mentioned that when he was down and out, Cheung always extended a helping hand to support him financially.

description.zh-cn: 张国荣是著名洋服裁缝张活海的儿子。
description.en: Leslie Cheung is the son of the famous tailor Zhang Huohai.

description.zh-cn: 张国荣是潘玉瑶的儿子。
description.en: Leslie Cheung is the son of Pan Yuyao.

description.zh-cn: 张国荣是张绿萍的弟弟，在家中排行第十。
description.en: Leslie Cheung is the younger brother of Zhang Lüping, and he was the tenth child in the family.

description.zh-cn: 张国荣与唐鹤德是长达20年的同性伴侣。1997年，张国荣在演唱会上公开二人关系。唐鹤德被张国荣视为生命中最重要的人之一。
description.en: Leslie Cheung and Daffy Tong were same-sex partners for 20 years. In 1997, Cheung publicly acknowledged their relationship at a concert. Cheung regarded Tong as one of the most important people in his life.

description.zh-cn: 张国荣曾与毛舜筠短暂交往，并在22岁时向她求婚，但遭到拒绝。
description.en: Leslie Cheung briefly dated Teresa Mo and proposed to her at the age of 22, but was rejected.

description.zh-cn: 张国荣于2002年患上内源性抑郁症，最终于2003年4月1日因病情失控跳楼自杀身亡。
description.en: Leslie Cheung was diagnosed with endogenous depression in 2002 and committed suicide on April 1, 2003, by jumping from a building due to his uncontrollable condition.

description.zh-cn: 热情演唱会因其前卫造型受到香港媒体的广泛批评，据其经纪人陈淑芬称，这次打击是导致张国荣患上抑郁症的最大原因。
description.en: The Passion Tour was widely criticized by the Hong Kong media for its avant-garde styling. According to his manager Florence Chan, this blow was the primary cause of Leslie Cheung's depression.

description.zh-cn: 黎小田是张国荣的恩师，1982年张国荣跟随他转投无线电视及旗下的华星唱片。
description.en: Michael Lai was Leslie Cheung's mentor. In 1982, Cheung followed him to join TVB and its subsidiary, Capital Artists.

description.zh-cn: 陈淑芬是张国荣的经纪人，在其职业生涯中扮演了重要角色。
description.en: Florence Chan was Leslie Cheung's manager and played a significant role in his career.

description.zh-cn: 张国荣曾考入利兹大学攻读纺织系，后因父亲中风而于大学一年级时辍学回港。
description.en: Leslie Cheung was admitted to the University of Leeds to study textile management but dropped out in his first year and returned to Hong Kong after his father suffered a stroke.

description.zh-cn: 歌曲《Monica》的发行使张国荣红透全香港，奠定了他在香港乐坛的巨星地位。
description.en: The release of the song 'Monica' made Leslie Cheung a massive star throughout Hong Kong, solidifying his superstar status in the local music scene.

description.zh-cn: 主演电影《霸王别姬》使张国荣蜚声国际影坛，获得了包括法国戛纳影展最佳男主角提名和日本影评人协会最佳男主角奖在内的多项荣誉。
description.en: Starring in the film 'Farewell My Concubine' brought Leslie Cheung international acclaim, earning him numerous honors including a Best Actor nomination at the Cannes Film Festival and the Best Actor award from the Japan Film Critics Association.

description.zh-cn: 张国荣凭借在电影《阿飞正传》中的演出，获得第十届香港电影金像奖最佳男主角。
description.en: For his performance in the film 'Days of Being Wild', Leslie Cheung won the Best Actor award at the 10th Hong Kong Film Awards.

description.zh-cn: 据一种说法，在1987年拍摄《倩女幽魂》时，王祖贤在片场以“哥哥”称呼张国荣，此后这个称呼便流传开来。
description.en: According to one account, during the filming of 'A Chinese Ghost Story' in 1987, Joey Wong addressed Leslie Cheung as 'Gor Gor' (older brother) on set, and the nickname subsequently became widespread.

description.zh-cn: 据一种说法，在合作《白发魔女传》时，张国荣称赞林青霞“姐姐你好美！”，林青霞则回应“哥哥你也好美！”，从此张国荣多了“哥哥”的绰号。
description.en: According to one account, while working on 'The Bride with White Hair', Cheung complimented Brigitte Lin, saying 'Sister, you are so beautiful!', to which Lin replied, 'Brother, you are beautiful too!'. Thereafter, Cheung gained the nickname 'Gor Gor' (older brother).

description.zh-cn: 张国荣于1982年至1987年间签约华星唱片。
description.en: Leslie Cheung was signed to Capital Artists from 1982 to 1987.

description.zh-cn: 张国荣于1987年至1990年间签约新艺宝唱片。
description.en: Leslie Cheung was signed to Cinepoly Records from 1987 to 1990.

description.zh-cn: 张国荣于1995年复出后至1999年间签约滚石唱片。
description.en: Leslie Cheung was signed to Rock Records from his comeback in 1995 until 1999.

description.zh-cn: 张国荣于1999年至2003年去世前签约环球唱片。
description.en: Leslie Cheung was signed to Universal Music from 1999 until his death in 2003.

description.zh-cn: 张国荣与梅艳芳是圈中挚友。
description.en: Leslie Cheung and Anita Mui were close friends in the entertainment industry.

description.zh-cn: 吴宇森是张国荣的好友，张国荣曾在吴宇森经济拮据时资助过他。
description.en: John Woo was a friend of Leslie Cheung. Cheung had financially supported Woo when he was facing financial difficulties.
